metadata.Title: CVE-2021-36369 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Dropbear through 2020.81. Due to anon-RFC-compliant check of the available authentication methods in theclient-side SSH code, it is possible for an SSH server to change the loginprocess in its favor. This attack can bypass additional security measuressuch as FIDO2 tokens or SSH-Askpass. Thus, it allows an attacker to abuse aforwarded agent for logging on to another server unnoticed.

criterions.comment: dropbear package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
